app.name: DomestIQ
app.tagline: A safer, smarter way for workers and households to connect
search.title: Find Workers
consent.title: Privacy Consent
consent.message: We collect and process your personal information in accordance with the POPI Act. By continuing, you consent to our data practices.
landing.hero.badge: Built for Mzansi. Built for us.
landing.hero.subtext: DomestIQ empowers domestic workers to find consistent, safe work — and helps households find help with confidence. Phone-first. All 11 SA languages. Always free for workers.
landing.worker.body: Millions of domestic workers across South Africa rely on word-of-mouth to find their next job. When one employer cuts ties, it can mean weeks without income. DomestIQ changes that. Build your profile once. Get found. Get booked. Get reviewed.
landing.worker.b1_desc: No more weeks without income. Get bookings straight to your phone.
landing.worker.b2_desc: Reviews, references, and a professional CV that grows with every job. Never start from zero again.
landing.worker.b3_desc: Verified clients. Know who you're working for before you arrive.
landing.worker.b4_desc: No email needed. No typing. Just tap icons and take a selfie.
landing.worker.b5_desc: Register and chat in Zulu, Xhosa, Sotho, Afrikaans — 11 SA languages.
landing.worker.b6_desc: 100% free for workers. You keep every rand you earn. No commission taken from you.
landing.client.body: No more relying on word-of-mouth and hoping for the best. Browse verified, rated professionals near you. See their work history, read honest reviews, and connect in minutes.
landing.client.b1_desc: ID checked, criminal records screened. Know who enters your home.
landing.client.b2_desc: Honest ratings from real households, plus written references you can trust.
landing.client.b3_desc: GPS-powered search. See who's available in your area right now.
landing.client.b4_desc: Book one-time or recurring. Calendar sync. Automatic reminders.
landing.how.ws1_desc: Tap icons to select your skills. No typing needed.
landing.how.ws2_desc: Households near you see your profile, rating, and availability.
landing.how.ws3_desc: Choose the jobs you want. Set your own schedule and rates.
landing.how.ws4_desc: Every good job earns reviews that attract more work.
landing.how.cs1_desc: Filter by service, distance, rating, and availability.
landing.how.cs2_desc: Check ratings, reviews, and verification badges.
landing.how.cs3_desc: Send a message or request a booking. Arrange the details directly.
landing.how.cs4_desc: Your review helps the community and rewards good workers.
landing.services.subtext: From household help to skilled trades. Workers register their skills. Households find exactly what they need.
landing.stories.s1_quote: I used to wait weeks between jobs, asking friends if they know anyone. Now I get bookings every week. My children can eat properly.
landing.stories.s2_quote: I cannot read well but the pictures and icons make it easy. I registered by myself on my phone. No help needed.
landing.stories.s3_quote: Before, I had no proof I am good at my work. Now my 47 five-star reviews speak for me. Clients trust me before I even arrive.
landing.stories.s4_quote: Finding a trusted helper used to mean asking friends and hoping for the best. DomestIQ changed that completely.
landing.stories.s5_quote: The verification badges give me peace of mind. I know who is coming to my house. That matters when you have kids.
landing.stories.s6_quote: I set my own rates. Nobody takes a cut from me. I earned R8,000 last month through DomestIQ alone.
landing.cta.body: Every worker who builds their profile creates opportunity. Every household that books through DomestIQ builds trust. Together, we're building something South Africa has never had — a trusted network for verified domestic work.
landing.footer.disclaimer: DomestIQ is a matching platform. No employment relationship is created between users.
landing.trust.t1_desc: Your data is protected under SA law
landing.faq.q1: Is DomestIQ really free for workers?
landing.faq.a1: Yes, 100% free. Workers keep every rand they earn. We never take a commission from worker earnings. The platform is funded by a small service fee paid by households.
landing.faq.q2: Do I need a smartphone to use DomestIQ?
landing.faq.a2: You need a phone that can access the internet. DomestIQ works on any smartphone browser — Android or iPhone. No app download needed. You can even add it to your home screen.
landing.faq.a3: Workers can upload their SA ID and criminal clearance certificate. Our team verifies these documents and awards a gold shield badge to fully verified workers. Verified workers get more bookings.
landing.faq.a4: DomestIQ is fully compliant with the POPI Act. Your personal data is encrypted, never sold to third parties, and only shared with your explicit consent.
landing.faq.a5: We currently serve major metros including Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, and Port Elizabeth. We are expanding to more cities. Register now even if your area is not yet listed.
landing.faq.q6: How does the booking process work?
landing.faq.a6: Households search for workers by service type and location, view profiles and reviews, then book a date and time. Workers receive the request and can accept or decline. You can also message workers directly to discuss details before booking.
landing.faq.q7: Can I book a worker for a once-off job?
landing.faq.a7: Absolutely. DomestIQ supports both once-off and recurring bookings. Whether you need a one-time deep clean or a weekly gardener, we have you covered.
landing.faq.a8: DomestIQ supports all 11 official South African languages including English, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sesotho, and more. Workers can register and communicate in their preferred language.
landing.cities.subtext: Workers and households connecting in major metros. Growing every week.
landing.cities.not_listed: Don't see your city? Register anyway — we're expanding fast!
landing.pwa.title: Add DomestIQ to Home Screen
landing.pwa.desc: Get quick access to bookings, messages, and more.
